name: Fading Light (Wouter De Moor, Enzo Mannaert, Zac Svae, ThomasVansteelandt)
name_original: Fading Light (Wouter De Moor, Enzo Mannaert, Zac Svae, ThomasVansteelandt)
description:
Keep your light alive as you explore the dark forest looking for a way out. Escaping ends up being harder than you first expected, requiring multiple items scattered around the environment guarded by shades.

Controls

WASD - Movement

F - Interact

Team
  • Thomas Vansteelandt
  • Enzo Mannaert
  • Isaac Sauer
  • Wouter De Moor
Credits
  • Assets from Quixel and Sketchfab
  • Music by Myuu
  • Sound by ZapSplat
  • Animations by Mixamo
